Description.Text: The Jolly Hotel Madison Towers is a charming European Boutique Hotel Located in the heart of Manhattan on Madison Avenue at 38th Street. The Jolly Hotel Madison Towers offer its guests a combination of the warmth and elegance of Italian style, the charm of 1920's American architecture and modern facilities to meet today’s business traveler needs.

Empire State Building 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km Times Square 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km Broadway Theater district 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km Rockefeller Center 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km St. Patrick Cathedral 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km Chrysler Building 0.4 miles - 0.6 Km United Nations Building 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km Central Park 1.2 miles - 1.9 Km Lincoln Center 2.0 miles - 3.2 Km Grand Central Station / Metro / Train 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km Penn Station / Metro / Train 0.8 miles - 1.3 Km Jacob Javits Convention Center 1.4 miles - 2.2 Km Morgan Library 0.1 miles – 0.2 Km NY public Library / Bryant Park 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km Museum of Modern Art (MOMA) 0.8 miles - 1.3 Km Metropolitan Museum of Art 2.2 miles - 3.5 Km Museum of Natural History 2.4 miles - 3.8 Km Fifth Ave. / Madison Ave. shopping 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km Lord & Taylor 0.1 miles – 0.2 Km Macy's 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km 34th street / Herald Square shopping 0.3 miles - 0.5 Km Saks Fifth Avenue 0.6 miles - 1.0 Km Apple store on Fifth Ave. 1.2 miles - 1.9 Km

The Jolly Madison Hotel has 242 comfortable guest rooms, offering a unique, relaxing and sophisticated European ambiance. Hotel have, Superior, Deluxe, and Junior Suites rooms with King/Queen/ Twin and Double beds. City or courtyard views are featured in guestrooms. Minibars, air conditioning, and clock radios are also included. Housekeeping is provided. All guestrooms are non-smoking.

Jolly Hotel Madison Towers has a full-service spa. Business amenities at this 3.0-star property include wireless Internet access (surcharge), meeting rooms for small groups, and business services. Jolly Hotel Madison Towers has a bar/lounge.
Pets accepted Check-out time is Noon Check-in time is 3 PM

From JFK International Airport Exit airport to Van Wyck Expwy, take exit 12B- I495 and merge onto Long Island Expwy-I495. Take I-495 to midtown tunnel. Stay right and continue west to Lexington Ave. Turn left onto Lexington Ave. and make right onto 37th St., turn right on Madison Ave. and turn right to 38th street. The hotel is on the right side at the corner of 38th St. and Madison Ave.
From LaGuardia Airport Exit airport to Grand Central Parkway West. Exit #4 to Brooklyn-Queens Expwy-I-278 West. Exit #35E to midtown tunnel. Stay right and continue west to Lexington Ave. Turn left onto Lexington Ave. and make right onto 37th street, turn right on Madison Ave. and turn right to 38th St. The hotel is on the right side at the corner of 38th St. and Madison Ave.

Enjoy a morning buffet breakfast and delicious cappuccino at Caffe’ Buongiorno, the hotel's breakfast room. The cafe serves a variety of pastries, muffins, bagels, cereals, cold cuts, cheeses and much more.
This 3 star hotel is located in the city centre of New York and was established in 1923. It is close to the Empire State Building and the nearest station is Grand Central Station.
